short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyse Twitter Posts and create AI-generated banters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Football Firm is a fun Chrome extension that helps football fans interact with rivals on Twitter. It uses AI to create smart, funny responses to tweets that you can use for light-hearted banter. 

Here's how it works:

1. Install Football Firm.
2. When you read a tweet from a rival fan, click the "Get Reply To The Tweet Below" button that appears at the top of the tweet.
3. The app will generate a fun, banter-filled response.
4. This response is automatically copied to your clipboard. (You'll have to allow the 'paste to clipboard' permission when you install the app for the first time.)
5. Paste the response into the reply section on Twitter and hit send.

Football Firm is perfect for fans who love a good comeback but sometimes find themselves lost for words. With our extension, you'll never be left without a quick-witted reply. It adds an extra level of enjoyment to your Twitter experience, making fan interactions even more fun and engaging. 

Install Football Firm now and become the fan who always has a comeback, right at their fingertips!
